cause.description:
If anyone is truly interested in the rebirth and renewal of the truly cultured city of New Orleans and its surrounding areas, then this is definately a cause worth fighting for. The children truly are our future. Adults and elders should take the time to recognize that children need attention, and sometimes its more than just a phone call in passing or a conversation made in a rush. The city can truly be a great place to raise families and to live if just enough attention is paid to our brightest hope for an opportunistic future- the kids. Please consider joining my cause. I truly think that it just takes one, but if many support, I think I can get this non-profit organization could get off the ground in the near future. Check back for updates!
1. To eliminate the social stigma placed on mental health issues
2. To create awareness of the burden placed on children especially after Hurricane Katrina
3. To create an opportunity for those with special needs and limited funding to gain access to mental health services
cause.mission: raise awareness about mental health issues in the Greater New Orleans Metro area for children and young adults
cause.name: The YOUNG Foundation
